title: BLUE ESSENCE MISSON BUG
body:
I didnt get the blue essence mission.YES my runes were purchesed before september 1,in fact i bought the 2 years ago,I had enough to complete 3 rune pages even if i only had 2 (I was a noob and buyed more than i needed).
HELP

replies.body: Hey I looked into this for you, but unfortunately I don't see any Greater runes that were purchased before September 1.  As a result, the account was not given a mission because there was no conversion to be completed.
